name: Pain of Your Own Making
flavor: You reverse the effects from an evildoer.
trigger: The target gains a condition or effect that is ended by a saving throw or that ends at the end of their turn.

metadata.flavor: You reverse the effects from an evildoer.
metadata.item_name: Pain of Your Own Making (9 Wrath)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The effect ends on the target and is applied to the creature who imposed the effect on them. That creature also takes damage equal to three times your Presence score.
